Before You BeginÂ¶

Once bhp_crypto is installed, review the models in your applications to identify fields that should use encryption. A data model is well designed if all the personally identifying information (PII) is kept in a just a few models. In the EDC, PII is found in model registered_subject, the locator models and the consent models.

Warning

Thoroughly test before implementing bhp_crypto in production or with real data.

Warning

Have a secure backup of encryption keys. Without the keys, data is lost.
